text:
ACADEMIZE WANTS TO FIX EDUCATION AND WE NEED YOUR HELP.

San Francisco, CA.

Front-End Developer UX Designer UI Designer

Academize is a venture-backed startup currently taking part in one of San Francisco's top accelerator programmes. We're a passionate team of edutech entrepreneurs looking for talented people who share our vision to come and join us.

If the above sounds interesting and you think you've got what it takes then please get in touch at jobs [at] academize [dot] com.
